p: The neuroprotective effects experiments showed that the SFP extract exhibits the highest neuroprotection capacity against amyloid beta toxicity. A smaller but similar effect was shared by the SFD extract. Unfortunately, the SFM extract did not reverse the A β 25–35 consequences. These results may lead to the assumption that SF extracts obtained with the use of less polar solvents possess higher neuroprotective ability, but further investigation with a larger number of solvents is necessary before safe conclusions may be drawn.
